Country.description: The country where the air quality index is measured.

City.description: The city where the air quality index is measured.

AQI Value.description: The overall Air Quality Index value.

AQI Category.description: The category of the overall Air Quality Index.

value_dict.Moderate: AQI is acceptable; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.
value_dict.Good: Air quality is considered satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk.
value_dict.Unhealthy: Everyone may begin to experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects.
value_dict.Very Unhealthy: Health warnings of emergency conditions. The entire population is more likely to be affected.
value_dict.Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is not likely to be affected.
value_dict.Hazardous: Health alert: everyone may experience more serious health effects.

CO AQI Value.description: The Air Quality Index value for Carbon Monoxide (CO).

CO AQI Category.description: The category of the Air Quality Index for Carbon Monoxide (CO).

value_dict.Good: Air quality is considered satisfactory for Carbon Monoxide, and air pollution poses little or no risk.
value_dict.Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects from Carbon Monoxide. The general public is not likely to be affected.
value_dict.Moderate: AQI is acceptable for Carbon Monoxide; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.

Ozone AQI Value.description: The Air Quality Index value for Ozone (O3).

Ozone AQI Category.description: The category of the Air Quality Index for Ozone (O3).

value_dict.Good: Air quality is considered satisfactory for Ozone, and air pollution poses little or no risk.
value_dict.Moderate: AQI is acceptable for Ozone; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.
value_dict.Unhealthy: Everyone may begin to experience health effects from Ozone; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects.
value_dict.Very Unhealthy: Health warnings of emergency conditions for Ozone. The entire population is more likely to be affected.
value_dict.Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects from Ozone. The general public is not likely to be affected.

NO2 AQI Value.description: The Air Quality Index value for Nitrogen Dioxide (NO2).

NO2 AQI Category.description: The category of the Air Quality Index for Nitrogen Dioxide (NO2).

value_dict.Good: Air quality is considered satisfactory for Nitrogen Dioxide, and air pollution poses little or no risk.
value_dict.Moderate: AQI is acceptable for Nitrogen Dioxide; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.

PM2.5 AQI Value.description: The Air Quality Index value for Particulate Matter (PM2.5).

PM2.5 AQI Category.description: The category of the Air Quality Index for Particulate Matter (PM2.5).

value_dict.Moderate: AQI is acceptable for Particulate Matter (PM2.5); however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.
value_dict.Good: Air quality is considered satisfactory for Particulate Matter (PM2.5), and air pollution poses little or no risk.
value_dict.Unhealthy: Everyone may begin to experience health effects from Particulate Matter (PM2.5); members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects.
value_dict.Very Unhealthy: Health warnings of emergency conditions for Particulate Matter (PM2.5). The entire population is more likely to be affected.
value_dict.Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects from Particulate Matter (PM2.5). The general public is not likely to be affected.
value_dict.Hazardous: Health alert for Particulate Matter (PM2.5): everyone may experience more serious health effects.

lat.description: The latitude of the city where the air quality index is measured.

lng.description: The longitude of the city where the air quality index is measured.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in environmental science.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the air quality, please predict the AQI Value.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted AQI Value is {AQI Value}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in environmental science.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the air quality, please predict the CO AQI Value.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted CO AQI Value is {CO AQI Value}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in environmental science.

prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted Ozone AQI Value is {Ozone AQI Value}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in environmental science.

prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted NO2 AQI Value is {NO2 AQI Value}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in environmental science.

prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted PM2.5 AQI Value is {PM2.5 AQI Value}.
